Phrasing it like it's black people's fault is weird and unfair, but banks giving loans to people who couldn't afford it was a significant cause of the financial crisis. It wasn't limited to black people, but they were maliciously targeted.

I went to the LGBT society at university one night because I'm a lonely mess and figure that there's bound to be at least one cute and single girl there, but to my shock it's all troomers who insist that they're real women and then try to hit on me despite me clearly being incredibly uncomfortable.
